question: A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary/unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/unpaid work at the museum.Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary/unpaid work.•	Explain why you want to do voluntary/unpaid work at the museum•	Describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful•	Give details of when you would be available for work
text: I am writing regarding the voluntary job advertised on the museum’s website. It has been a while that I have been seeking a part-time job to spend my time productively, as I am a junior student and cannot apply for a full-time career. Moreover, as this job is consistent with my interests in history and traditional arts, not having an income is not an all-important matter to me.

As I am bilingual and speak Spanish and English fluently, and most of our hometown’s tourists are Spanish, I can effectively communicate with those who visit the museum and guide them around. In addition, I can advertise in the university to draw students to this centre which is financially and culturally beneficial.

In terms of work time, although I have university classes during the weekdays, I can manage to be present at the gallery through the evening shifts. I can be available full-time at the weekends if there is not the exam season.
I look forward to receiving your answer,
